snippet: After a string of impressive victories, Joel Rosario is the leading money winner among the nation’s jockeys, and he stands a good chance to increase his earnings in the Preakness.
abstract: Joel Rosario is leading money winner among the nation’s jockeys, and he stands a good chance to increase his earnings in the Preakness Stakes; he will be riding Orb, 2013 Kentucky Derby winner and favorite to win; horses for 138th running of Preakness listed in order of post position with comments.
lead_paragraph: After a string of impressive victories, Joel Rosario is the leading money winner among the nation’s jockeys, and he stands a good chance to increase his earnings in the Preakness.

headline.seo: Joel Rosario, Orb’s Jockey, Also Sits Atop the Racing World
headline.main: Jockey Is Atop the Favorite, and All of Racing
headline.print_headline: Jockey Is Atop the Favorite, and All of Racing
